text: ql lahum -ayha alrswl- sadaq allah fima akhbr bih wfyma shreh. fa'iina kuntum sadiqin fi mhbtkm wantsabkm lkhlyl allah 'iibrahim ealayh alslam fatabieuu mllath alty shreha allah ealaa lisan muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm, fa'iinaha alhaqu aldhy la shaka fyh. wama kan 'iibrahim ealayh alslam min almushrikin biallah fi twhydh webadth ahdana
